title: Anyone else experiencing lower fps since last patch? (7.22 pre-season)
body:
I don't know if it's because there's a lot of new shit going on in the game, but I have like 30 lower fps than usual. And then I had low fps to beging with. I have an i5 2400 processor, which isn't that good but it should be enough for LoL and a GTX 1050. I used to have around 100-150 fps before and around 70-80 in teamfights on medium-high settings. Now, I got way lower fps. I'm never over 100 and like 50 in teamfights and there is no way my computer should have that low fps when I can play PUBG with mostly 60+ fps, which is a way more demanding game and in fuckin beta as well.
I think LoL always been a bit badly optimized, since you can see streamers like Imaqtipie hit 75-80 fps in intensive teamfights with his fuckin i7 7700k processor and gtx 1080. Like wtf how is that even possible? The game is very old and looks kinda bad compared to the new stuff coming out (in terms of graphics) and the fps is still VERY low.
A strange thing is that people with similar components to those that I have, or even worse ones gets higher fps. I've tried everything like maxing windows 10 in terms of gaming performance and re-installed the game multiple times but I do think the problem is with LoL, since I got no problems with other games. CSGO is 200+ fps almost all the time with maxed settings for example, and it's a bit more demanding than LoL.

replies.body:
Hey, I've brought this up to our tech folks and we need ya'll to send in those logs previously requested so we can investigate further.  If something is going on, we need to look closer and find out!  

(Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to collect some logs, and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). -)

It may also be coincidence but I've seen the biggest incoming of reports coming from EU players, and our EU support team is requesting logs as well in [this thread](https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/zHMok0mm-known-issues-and-faqs-preseason-and-end-of-season?comment=0041).  

Help us get this info so we can investigate further.

Stop asking for Logs, you´ve got so much logs of people with expensive, well performing hardware, who got even before this patch only around 100FPS. 

Adding new Champs, Animations and other things wont make the game better if you dont start to change something at your coding... to be honest it will make the game even worse. I´ve got an i7 4790 and an overclocked gtx1080.. and my FPS dip even under 60 in teamfights since this patch. If you force people to buy rune pages and champions with RP with your awesome new system, then hopefully you´ve got now enough money to improve the performance of league. 

And yes, I´ve sent my logs several times, but after writing a ticket and trying those things for more than a month i dont want to waste any more time for that game. I know that my Hardware isn´t the issue, so it´s your turn.  There are people who want to play with 144hz monitors, so fix this pls.
Lets hope this problem gets fixed ASAP! I sent in my logs a couple of days ago, hope it helps!

I got the same issue, specifically in team fights or when I unzoom with jhin or any other event where new assets are loaded, I didnt have the issue before the patch, I have a quad core high speed processor that is way above specs and the hardware/software is fine.
At the start of this season i had 250-300 FPS, and now i have max 100 FPS. So yeah.. Is funny how there was no visual update, and still my FPS is low af.

I'm not aware of anything changing that would require more demanding hardware, but patch days are really good at pinpointing issues.  Your might have some bad game files or may just need to update your drivers.  Go over each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out possibilities while tuning things up.

If that doesn't help, stick to custom games for now and download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs.  Attach the logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can help you out directly.

Well something is obviously wrong with the latest patch considering all the people here who have experienced this problem. Maybe we are a minority, but it's still a problem. I have reinstalled the game and also repaired the client and nothing have worked. I've followed the FPS issue guide as well but that didn't work either.  I am currently  reinstalling the game again and if I have the same problems as before I'm willing to try this hextech repair tool thing. But since I have reinstalled the game again there shouldn't be any problems with the logs or the files that the hextech tool could fix right? 

I would appreciate if you could forward this issue to the actual programmers on Riot because I'm 100% certain that this issue have something to do with optimizing. As I said before, I've always had lower fps than my computer should have to begin with. And I have never had fps issues with any other game. This could have something to do with the ancient game engine LoL is using I have no idea. But I truly believe that the biggest and best video game in the world should function better than this. The game is working well for many people yes, but I see no reason why it shouldn't work well for everyone with at least decent computers.

MOFFA's right. This has been happening on and off for the past few patches and is definitely something on Riots end. Last patch my FPS was staying over 100 stable, this one it has dropped right down to 40 or even worse depending on some situations. 
I have updated drivers, done clean installations, Hextech Repair Tool, defragment, registry cleaner. I've done everything. This has something to do with the patches itself.
This is ridiculously infuriating and not acceptable, especially considering this has been a recurring thing over the past YEAR and the only thing we're being told about it is "make sure your installation isn't bugged or your drivers are updated" like many have been told. Why should every fortnightly patch be a roulette to decide from the get-go whether my games performance for the upcoming fortnight goes to shit or not?
This is definitely on your end and needs to be prioritized, as I've seen numerous threads mentioning about this on Reddit, yet it's being completely ignored or not investigated.

Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080ti
AMD FX-8350 

I have been experiencing this issue since the pre-season patch came out in OCE yesterday. The longer the game goes on, the lower it gets. It even gets down to a consistent and horrible 40 super late-game which is absolutely unacceptable, and that's not even during team fights, that's just regularly walking down lane. I have the best bloody GPU you can get and a 165Hz monitor, so anything below 70 looks absolutely awful and sluggish. 

There is something very very very wrong with the optimization of this game in this patch and it seems every patch it just gets worse.

Same issue here. I have a GTX 1080 ti and a I7 5820k and my fps at the start of the game is about 250 and then when minions spawn drops to 150 then throughout laning goes from about 140 to 90 fps. teamfights can drop to 50 fps. Its insane I have a 2000$ rig top the line and the game is laggy at 1080p with my 144hz monitor.

same for me, down from 140-100 lategame to 100-80 midgame

4770k gtx 780 nvidia treiber 388.13

EDIT: When i take Kletomancy, the fps get even lower imo.

This might be true. The few games i played i used Kleptomancy. My FPS dropped from 60 (yeah low specc gear i know) to 30 fps.. I played one ARAM with another Keystone and didnt noticed that hard drops.
same here
me 2

Atleast we all have same problem, so its balanced :)
{{champion:74}}
Same

downloaded 388.31 drivers and playing on borderless with vsync on is perfect now

fullscreen doesnt seem to vsync which then also doesnt seem to work with gsync

This problem wasn't just here since 7.22 but now it has evolved into the next level which is good, because it seems like some people on riots end ignored this problem over almost a full Year, it is clearly from the games side and has nothing to do with our Pc's "bad" hardware. there is smth going on, and the longer the game goes, the lower the fps gets
its an memory leak as i see, because the longer the game gets the lower the fps drop, and its constant not low spikes, gtx 1080 here and never had this

This is a very serious issue and I feel like it's not being addressed properly or thoroughly. This should be treated like a game breaking error, and fixed ASAP. I get 200+Fps highest settings starting out and late game 40 fps in some real team fights and it's the same either lowest settings or highest settings, so I don't understand that either.

> [{quoted}](name=Jigglypuff,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tUlIPfmb,comment-id=0025,timestamp=2017-11-12T09:59:10.793+0000)

I get 200+Fps highest settings starting out and late game 40 fps in some real team fights and it's the same either lowest settings or highest settings, so I don't understand that either.

agreed. here's hoping this gets noticed more and fixed because it's annoying having to drop to low fps late game and having to reconnect to fix it.
Do we have to wait the next patch to fix this problem.Because I can't play with 20 fps

Nice Riot before this Patch was out everything was okay.
But now having Fps lags in Late game 44 fps!
When the Games start i got 140 Fps.
How can this even be possible?
All my other Games that i play im not lagging.
It is ofc Riot's fault!
Something is wrong with the Patch, fix it! {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
I'm getting the exact same issues. Ran at 100-150+ prior to 7.22. Now I am getting 70-80 sometimes it'll dip even lower than that.

I've got the same issue too except my computer restarted during playing the game 3 times !!! 
Riot pls optimize the game more so then i can play the game thank you !
my specs : intel Q9550        Ram :  2GB          Graphic card : ATI 5670

No offense , but can we keep this thread about FPS? And not Quests or Package Loss? Me and the rest really want to get that fixed. And those are way different problems, which deserve to be heared aswell, but not in a  thread about FPS drops.
 {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

My ping (and others') was jumping a lot in the PBE, so I thought it could be something similar at first but when I look ping is fine. I know it isn't packet loss because my connection is wired, so I have to agree it's a problem with League.

Yes i have the same problem i before this patch i had 60 fps,then in this patch in lane first 10 min i have normal 60+fps after 10 min my fps drops 50-45 just in lane with few minions and other player. But when in team fights my fps drops to 30-29. So ye Riot games back at it {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{sticker:sg-syndra}}   

(EDIT) Maybe it is in the drivers all the problems i saw here are on gtx cards so maybe  nvidia needs to update drivers for this upate if riot changed something in the game??

Ye same here, but there is something like a mini solution, let's say after 30 minutes when your game is under 60 FPS, and you reconnect, you will be on game starting FPS. i know its not a real solution, but you can atleast finish the game on normal FPS
Yeah this is on riot, They can come up with 100 diff things you canb "try" and do.. ultimately it's on them. They have a lazy staff apparently.

Still not fixed... Impressive.

Running an i7 5820k and a GTX 1080 here and I get like 60-80 fps after 20mins even with minimum settings while I usually play with ~300fps and maybe ~200fps in teamfights.

And of course, 60-80fps looks absolutely awful and sluggish on a 144Hz monitor. It's just unplayable.

Funny how I can run Nioh maxed out in 4k with 60fps, and can't play a game of League of Legends in 1080p anymore...

Im on NA servers and the lag is crazy. fps just randomly drops in fights. one moment you are alive and then the next you are dead. i have done all the steps riot says to do on their support page including updating/reinstalling drivers, defrag hard drive, reinstall game, adjusted nvida control panel and in game settings. thank god its preseason cause many people would be losing ranked games due to this stuff. im not sure what else i can do to fix it. i just opened a ticket with my logs from hextech repair tool also.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
still...

I wanted to add that I am getting this problem on the NA server.

My experience: Prior to this patch 7.22, I have gotten a consistent 120+ FPS at max settings.  Now, I start around that but 10-20 minutes into a game it drops to 90 then all the way down to 02 or so.  This doesn't just affect my game but my entire computer becomes slow and unresponsive.  When I minimize the game, everything else is slow.  Trying to re-maximize the game window causes me to see a black screen with the League border and then about 2 minutes before the game actually resumes.  It's like lagging out.  I honestly think it's a memory problem because when I pull up task manager my memory is spiking at 100% usage.

This doesn't happen all of the time.  Rather, I can play 3-4 games before it starts to occur.  Sometimes it never occurs.  I can exit League and then start it up again, and that seems to (temporarily) fix the problem before it starts to occur again.

My specs:
NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680, DirectX 12.0 (recently uninstalled and re-installed), 16 GB RAM, i5 Intel processor, Windows 10 Pro 64-bit.

I run a dual screen set-up and usually have Chrome/Firefox playing music and Discord open on the other monitor.

this sounds like a different issue entirely, my memory only sits at like 50%ish while still dipping to low fps late game. my desktop doesn't slow down or lag at all and the low fps late game happens every single game for me and i have to reconnect to fix it.

I have the same problem, but i lost nearly 100 fps and also have problems in teamfight because my picture shakes a lot. Dont know what to do anymore. I even updated all drivers and reinstalled lol. Before that patch i never had a problem.
same thing, low fps as of late usually i'm 120. now it drops to 30 late game.
Sooooo no response?

i have a amd 860k quadcore cpu and a gtx 1050ti 8gb ram, before the patch i was running 100 fps late game some times 80 in big fights, now it drops to 80 at around 5 minutes in, and my last game i just played it dropped too 32 fps in a late game fight............. 32.....

This is OBVIOUSLY on Riot's end. They've been a terrible company ever since the end of season 2. When they decided they didn't really care about their players, and they would suck them dry for all they've got. All they care about is content and sales. And of course like every other major company, if there's a problem it's on your end 100% of the time. It's time for the players of this community to stop accepting mediocre programming and giant ponzi schemes and they start treating their player base with respect. You can't just say " oh well it's a free game." While marketing products like absolutely crazy, pumping out merchandise before you fix the match making system or try to balance the once great game that this giant melting pot of idiots turned into a cesspool. I haven't posted on this stupid forum since 2011, and I was banned off of them for saying the same shit. My standards for riot have been EXTREMELY low for years, but this is RIDICULOUS.  The people that made this game good years and years ago are long gone getting their dicks sucked in the Caribbean, now all that's left are these silicon valley morons fucking shit up. Not even asking you to balance it or fix it since we all know you're incapable of doing that. At least make it functional. Fix your fucking game.
lol wut

Same...

Before patch 7.22): 160-210 fps all ultra
New patch 7.22): Earlygame 70-120, Lategame 22-55 fps... all normal...
I hate this patch {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

Having a weird issue as of late where my fps start to decline the longer the game goes on. usually start at like 144ish but then around the 20-30 min area my fps drop down to 50 and it's like almost unplayable. leaving the game and rejoining seems to fix it, so i don't think it's a overheating issue or anything. i've tried cleaning out my pc, reformating my ssd, reinstalling league..basically everything but downgrading my drivers. my gpu is a radeon rx 480 with the latest drivers.
low fps late to mid game, restart the game, fps went back up.
AH THANK GOD ITS NOT ONLY ME. i was soo scared
Same here with gtx 980m i7 6700hq

Same here...
GTX 970,I5 6600 and fps drops to ~90-80 in late game teamfights.
I got 144hz monitor so there is a big difference between 140 and 80 and you can easily feel it...

Me as well, I had into the late game 120 fps or a bit less, but I still didn't experience any short lags/cuts/delays before the patch, so it is definately caused by the new patch (7.22). I have a GTX 960M respectively a gaming laptop and I had to put everything on "very low" except the outlook option on "high", but still experience in late game 90 fps or less (delays, cuts, lags, etc.). I never had such tremendous fps issues before, what should I do?

replies.poster: S a t h o x
replies.body: I dont have a good pc but b4 this patch i had stable 60+fps and now in the mid-late game it randomly drops below 20!!! Its like unplayable at that level :/
